name: xrsmgmdifsgrp

stmt.origin: mpbir2an(wcel(cxrs, cdif(cmgm, csgrp)), wcel(cxrs, cmgm), wn(wcel(cxrs, csgrp)))
stmt.pretty: mpbir2an(ℝ* ∈(Mgm \ SGrp), ℝ* ∈ Mgm, ¬ ℝ* ∈ SGrp)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cxrs, cdif(cmgm, csgrp))
-| wcel(cxrs, cmgm)
-| wn(wcel(cxrs, csgrp))
-| wb(wcel(cxrs, cdif(cmgm, csgrp)), wa(wcel(cxrs, cmgm), wn(wcel(cxrs, csgrp))))
body.pretty:
⊢ ℝ* ∈(Mgm \ SGrp)
⊣ ℝ* ∈ Mgm
⊣ ¬ ℝ* ∈ SGrp
⊣ (ℝ* ∈(Mgm \ SGrp)↔(ℝ* ∈ Mgm ∧ ¬ ℝ* ∈ SGrp))

comment: The "additive group" of the extended reals is a magma but not a semigroup, and therefore also not a monoid nor a group, in contrast to the "multiplicative group", see ~ xrsmcmn . (Contributed by AV, 30-Jan-2020.)
